game.name: Digital Meow
game.shortDescription: Digital Meow는 작은 고양이가 새로운 집을 찾기 위해 디지털 세계를 여행하는 베이퍼웨이브 플랫폼 게임입니다. 이 복고풍 도전적인 모험에서 레이저, 스파이크, 대포를 극복하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Digital Meow is a vaporwave platformer where a little cat journeys through a digital world to find a new home. Overcome lasers, spikes, and cannons in this nostalgic and challenging adventure!

reviewHighlights.text: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38888018-United-Critics/] Please follow [b]United Critics[/b] for quality reviews[/url] [h2]Digital Meow R...
I was really looking forward to Digital Meow, but it turned out to be a huge disappointment. The graphics are subpar, and the gameplay feels repetitiv...
